SEARCH
Module SoftEng_2024
Package SoftEng_2024.View

Class LocalModel

java.lang.Object
SoftEng_2024.View.LocalModel
public class LocalModel extends Object
Represents the local model that manages game state, player information, cards, boards, and communication in a multiplayer game environment.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new LocalModel instance initializing all necessary fields.

    • isAckReceived

      public boolean isAckReceived()
      Checks if an acknowledgement has been received.
      Returns:
      false if an acknowledgement has been received, otherwise true. This inversion of the return boolean value was done because every check on this value tests if it is false. By adding a not operator to each check condition, we changed the value at the source to simplify the checks.
